verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He is king of kings,
he is Lord of Lords
Jesus Christ,
the first and the last,
no man was like him. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He died on the cross
to save us all,
no man was like him.
He rose from the dead
to give us life,
no man was like him.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I know that
my redeemer lives,
no man was like him.
He will come again
to take us home,
no man was like him.
